title: Otoy releases OctaneRender 2026.1
description: Big update to the GPU renderer adds meshlet streaming for dense geometry, and support for 3DGS data, MaterialX and OpenPBR.
content:
Wednesday, December 3rd, 2025
Posted by Jim Thacker
Originally posted on 3 December 2024 for the alpha, and updated for the stable release.
Otoy has released OctaneRender 2026.1, the latest versio… [+6453 chars]
